mapper.insert:
insert into t_member_flow(sn, uid, username, before_money, after_money, flow_money, item, item_zh, create_time, ext) values
( #{item.sn}, #{item.uid}, #{item.username}, #{item.beforeMoney}, #{item.afterMoney}, #{item.flowMoney}, #{item.item}, #{item.itemZh}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.ext} )
